etapes.message: Go to DMC to start the game
My name is Antoine. And for another day, as the day before I work at the factory,  at DMC to be more precise.
We are January 1898, Elssas still belong to Deutschland, and as many of my friends, even if we are children, we work here.
In my case, I’m only 16 years old, and every day I wake up at 6 a.m. up to 10 p.m.
My job here is to create a pipeline to provide water to the factory. Because if you don’t know, the textile industry consumes tons of water.
Providing water is not enough, as we have concerns about saving water, so I need to match a certain level of not wasting it.
